' name: Reset All Auth Passwords ' purpose: reset the password property of all or selected users that are going ' to be logging into innovator via the LOGON_USER client extension. ' created: 4-MAY-2005 George J. Carrette ' MethodTemplateName=VBMain; Dim shared_secret As String Dim allowed_domain_users_pat As System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex Dim denied_domain_users_pat As System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex Dim isShaHash As Boolean Function setuserpassword(ByVal user_id As String, _ ByVal password As String) As String Dim sql As String = String.Format(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture, "UPDATE [USER] SET [PASSWORD] = '{0}' WHERE [ID] = '{1}'", CCO.DB.InnDatabase.QuoteValue(password), CCO.DB.InnDatabase.QuoteValue(user_id)) CCO.DB.InnDatabase.ExecuteSQL(sql) Return "OK" End Function Friend Shared Function md5string16(ByVal input As String, ByVal forceSha As Boolean) As String Dim hashAlg As System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm = Nothing Try If Not forceSha Then Try hashAlg = new System.Security.Cryptography.MD5CryptoServiceProvider() Catch ex As InvalidOperationException 'FIPS is ON in windows registry hashAlg = Nothing End Try End If If hashAlg Is Nothing Then hashAlg = new System.Security.Cryptography.SHA256CryptoServiceProvider() End If Dim asciiEncoding As New ASCIIEncoding Dim data As Byte() = asciiEncoding.GetBytes(input) Dim resulthash As Byte() = hashAlg.ComputeHash(data) Dim sb As StringBuilder = New StringBuilder(16) Dim j As Integer For j = 0 To resulthash.Length - 1 sb.AppendFormat("{0:X2}", resulthash(j)) Next Return sb.ToString() Finally if hashAlg IsNot Nothing Then CType(hashAlg, IDisposable).Dispose() End If End Try End Function Function resetuser(ByVal user_id As String, ByVal login_name As String) As String Dim result As String = CCO.Context.Server.HtmlEncode(login_name) + ": " If Not allowed_domain_users_pat.IsMatch(login_name) Then Return result + "did not match allowed_domain_users" End If If denied_domain_users_pat.IsMatch(login_name) Then Return result + "matched denied_domain_users" End If Dim password As String = md5string16(md5string16(shared_secret, isShaHash) + _ md5string16(login_name.ToLower(), isShaHash) + _ login_name.ToLower() + shared_secret, isShaHash) Return result + setuserpassword(user_id, password) End Function Function mainloop(ByVal user_id As String) As String If (Not String.IsNullOrEmpty(user_id)) Then user_id = user_id.Replace("'", "''") End If Dim sb As System.Text.StringBuilder = New System.Text.StringBuilder() Dim sql As String = "select id,login_name from [USER]" If (Not String.IsNullOrEmpty(user_id)) Then sql = sql + String.Format(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture, " where id='{0}'", CCO.DB.InnDatabase.QuoteValue(user_id)) End If sql = sql + " order by login_name asc" Dim rs As Aras.Server.Core.InnovatorDataSet = CCO.DB.InnDatabase.ExecuteSelect(sql) Dim flag As Boolean = False While Not rs.Eof If flag Then sb.Append("
") End If flag = True sb.Append(resetuser(CStr(rs.Value("id")), CStr(rs.Value("login_name")))) rs.MoveNext() End While Return sb.ToString() End Function Function main() As Item If Not CCO.Permissions.UserHasRootOrAdminIdentity() Then Return Me.getInnovator().newError("must be administrative user to reset passwords") End If Dim cfgpath As String = "/Innovator/ClientLogon" CCO.Startup.debuglog("Reset All Auth Passwords: IN", Me.dom) Dim cfg As XmlElement = _ CType(CCO.Cache.GetCacheInfo("ApplicationXML").SelectSingleNode(cfgpath), XmlElement) CCO.Startup.debuglog("Reset All Auth Passwords: CFG", cfg) Dim user_id_element As XmlElement = CType(Me.dom.SelectSingleNode("//id"), XmlElement) Dim user_id As String = "" If Not IsNothing(user_id_element) Then user_id = user_id_element.InnerText End If CCO.Startup.debuglog("Reset All Auth Passwords: ID", user_id) If IsNothing(cfg) Then Return Me.getInnovator().newError("cannot find " + cfgpath + " in configuration file") End If shared_secret = cfg.GetAttribute("shared_secret") allowed_domain_users_pat = _ New System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex(cfg.GetAttribute("allowed_domain_users"), _ System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnoreCase) denied_domain_users_pat = _ New System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex(cfg.GetAttribute("denied_domain_users"), _ System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnoreCase) isShaHash = String.Equals(cfg.GetAttribute("fipsMode"), "true", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) Return Me.getInnovator().newResult(mainloop(user_id)) End Function
